['Provide insight and recommendations to business leaders on its financial performance, focusing on key drivers including profitability models, trends, and analytical needs.', 'Lead key financial processes across the organization, including Financial Planning, Forecasting and Management Reporting & Analysis.', 'Diagnose and influence the key drivers of the business. Analyze and present complex financial information in simple terms, presenting conclusions and recommendations to business leaders.', 'Advise cross functional teams on best practices related to data analysis and reporting.', 'Supports annual budgeting processes for all departments, including building the calendar for submissions and reviews with executive leadership.', "Ensure alignment of financial plan with the company's quarterly business plans.", 'Provide profitability comparison vs budget, and detailed analysis of variance.', 'Prepare forecasts and financial/operational dashboards for presentation to executive management.', 'Provide input on business systems requirements while evaluating new financial systems, building automation into processes.', 'Provide financial and business leadership and mentorship within the planning team and cross-functionally to business partners across the organization. Cultivating high performance teams and facilitating career development while leading is a must for this role.', 'Help set the strategy and operational priorities across the planning team.', 'Builds and manages partnerships across Business Leaders and works with cross-functional teams to deliver on strategic goals and objectives, increase revenue and revenue efficiency, and improve profitability.', 'Works closely with the CFO to execute organizational goals and objectives', '5+ years of experience in Finance/Business Leadership; Controllership and/or FP&A Leadership', '5+ years of experience leading OR managing budget, revenue/sales and/or forecasting plans', 'Previous experience working in a technology or software company is strongly desired, or experience working in any high growth company or division.', 'Excellent business-savvy with a consultative approach; ability to influence and collaborate with senior level leaders across organizational lines.', 'Proven ability to develop and execute strategic long-range plans across a wide scope within the organization, effectively translating client needs into solutions.', 'Strong communications skills, both written and verbal.', 'Comfort and experience leading in a matrixed environment, where work is done through influence, teamwork and collaboration. You are a natural leader that attracts others and have either established yourself as or can be seen as a thought leader.', 'You are a phenomenal teammate who prioritizes team success over individual accolades', 'You have consistently demonstrated high levels of emotional intelligence and have received 360 degree feedback supporting your leadership in this regard.', 'Employer funded medical plan for employees and their dependents.', 'Employer funded dental plan for employees and their dependents.', '401K retirement savings plan with 100% match of the first 3% of employee contributions and 50% of the next 2%.', 'Company paid disability and life insurance and the option to purchase additional coverage for yourself and family.', 'Unlimited PTO Policy', '10 Company paid Holidays.', 'Generous Parental Leave.']

['Developing sound partnerships with each client;', 'Engaging with our clients to better understand their human capital requirements and goals;', 'Delivering value-add solutions that keep our clients compliant and on the right track;', 'Doing it right.', 'Developing workforce strategic plans that incorporate future requirements and succession planning needs', 'Conducting workforce gap analyses and assessments to identify gap reduction strategies including an evaluation of operational effectiveness, including systems, policies, and standards; and competencies and draft proficiency levels', 'Conduct external benchmarking and internal focus groups to validate competencies and proficiency levels', 'Map competencies and position descriptions to career-pathing program', 'Establishing, leveraging, and supporting the creation of a talent pipeline with colleges and universities that are aligned with the agency’s mission critical disciplines', 'Providing comprehensive source of global talent supply and demand data, predictive analytics and insights into real-time job markets']

industry and regulatory frameworks and standards (e.g. NIST, SOC2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, FedRAMP, OWASP, ITIL, SOX, etc.).', 'Professional certifications e.g. CISSP, CEH, CIPP, CISM, PMP, CISA and procedures', 'Strong audit documentation skills', 'Proficient in systems / technology “As-Is vs. To-Be” analysis', 'You are a team-player with high EQ', 'You are highly motivated, hardworking, job_text: ['Job', 'Company', 'Bachelor’s degree in an applicable discipline (marketing, business, communications)', '5+ years of digital marketing, communications, or employer branding experience', 'Experience creating digital content and social media community management', 'Develop relevant content topics to reach the company’s target candidates.', 'Create, curate, and manage all published content (images, video, written).', 'Monitor, listen and respond to users in a “Social” way while cultivating leads. Explore social listening and how we can leverage this tool to improve our channels and inform brand strategy.', 'Develop and expand community and/or influencer outreach efforts across all channels.', 'Oversee design (ie: Social media graphics for LinkedIn cover, profile pic, thumbnails, ads, landing pages, etc.).', 'Design, create and manage promotions and social ad campaigns, being sure to integrate with Amazon’s global employer brand strategy.', 'Analyze key metrics and tweak strategy as needed.', 'Compile reports for quarterly business reviews as well report on content performance dashboards to inform our social strategy, highlighting social media impact and recruiting ROI.', 'Monitor effective benchmarks (Best Practices) for measuring the impact of social media campaigns. Analyze, review, and report on effectiveness of campaigns in an effort to maximize results.', 'Monitor trends in social media tools, applications, channels, design and strategy.', 'Master’s degree in an applicable discipline (marketing, business, communications)', 'Understanding of the digital and online space, and how it impacts the job seeker’s experience', 'Excellent writing skills', 'Keenly focused and able to pay painstaking attention to important details', 'Understanding of digital marketing, and experience developing relevant content for a diverse audience', 'Basic programming experience (HTML, JavaScript, CSS), and familiarity with Google Analytics, Omniture, Sprinklr and Simply Measured', 'Graphic design experience or familiarity with design concepts', 'Experience creating metrics to measure communication effectiveness, reach and engagement', "Demonstrated ability to exercise high judgment and creativity in narrow time frames and willingness to roll up one's sleeves to get work done, even when at times it’s outside the scope of the job"]

['Design and develop Qlik Dashboards within an Agile environment.', 'Work closely with the DOD customer within an Agile team to identifying metrics and analyzing data for use in BI Reporting.', 'Test and validate data in reports developed within the team.', 'Participate in resolving technical issues that arise during development.', 'Communicate and coordinate with members of the development team to work across multiple projects.', 'Other duties as assigned or required.', '1 year of experience creating advanced formulas, macros, and/or visualizations within Excel', '1 year of experience identifying metrics and analyzing data', 'Experience working on government funded programs.', '1 year of experience developing reports and dashboards with Business Intelligence software such as QlikView, Qlik Sense, Cognos, Tableau, or Power BI.', '1 year of experience working on a team with 3 or more developers.', 'Experience in an Agile development environment utilizing tools such as JIRA and Confluence (or comparable tools from other vendors).', 'Knowledge of Qlik scripting, set analysis, and QVD creation']

job_title: Senior Analyst, Audience Growth and SEO
job_text: ['Provide analytical support to editorial, technical, product and business development teams. Defining key metrics and analyzing impacts of changes', 'Work closely with editorial leadership to identify opportunities for content creation', 'Provide regular reports on search and social trends to the editorial teams', 'Provide SEO recommendations and support for editorial content or product changes', 'Work with teams across the company to understand business needs, evaluate the optimal strategies, and assist in the goal-setting process', 'Create and maintain key weekly, monthly and special reports, dashboards and analysis using various sources of data from Google Analytics and Shopify to Facebook ads.', 'Create ad-hoc reports as requested in a timely and accurate manner', 'Maintain and manage site tracking and tagging', 'Work closely with the technical team on the implementation of new site tags', '3+ years relevant professional experience in an analytical role preferably with entertainment or news organizations', 'Experience using analytics tools e.g. Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics…', 'Advanced Excel and Data visualization skills (Data Studio, Looker, Tableau, etc.)', 'Understanding of SEO strategies such as Headline and Meta optimization or structured data implementation', 'Understanding of Performance marketing strategies is preferred', 'Strong communication and presentation skills – written, visual, and verbal', 'Experience using audience growth tools (e.g. Google Trends, Crowdtangle, SEMRush, Yoast…) a plus', 'Excellent analytical reasoning and problem-solving skills', 'Strong attention to detail, comfortable aggregating and manipulating large data sets accurately', 'Comfortable working with developers on the implementation of new site tags', 'Interested in CRM or Ecommerce a plus', 'Paid time off', 'Monday to Friday', 'Fully Remote', 'https://consequenceofsound.net/', 'Yes']

job_title: Health and Well Being Insights Lead
job_text: ['Combine market, product and process knowledge with data to identify opportunities to improve business capability', 'Work with product owners and SMEs to understand products/services and analyze business and technical information in order to develop business requirements, user stories and journey maps', 'Develop hypotheses around products to ensure clear methodology for measuring impact and outcomes', 'Translate quantitative and qualitative information into actionable insights and meaningful story lines to inform organizational and product decisions', 'Perform regular reviews and analyses of product capabilities and publish product/program KPIs to report utilization trends and enterprise performance dashboards. Work with Total Rewards business partners including Global Benefits and Workforce Analytics to conduct outcome analytics research', 'Gather customer feedback, build user personas and conduct customer/user interviews to understand customer needs, perception of the product and identify new product enhancement opportunities to inform product roadmaps', 'Support innovation and tech transfer/intake to help maintain a robust innovation pipeline of emerging digital health capabilities', 'Perform basic data modeling. Experience with various analytic, visualization and business intelligence tools a plus', 'Educate organization on data, data management principles and metric reporting', 'Champion product and brand both internally and externally', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree is required', 'A minimum of 6 years of business experience with at least 3 years in healthcare, wellness, digital health, analytics and/or innovation is required', 'Proven ability to manage projects and build strong partnerships with the business, operations, technology and other key stakeholders is required', 'Experience integrating data and conducting data analysis around products and programs is required', 'Knowledge of privacy and healthcare data management is preferred', 'Experience working with matrixed, geographically distributed and functionally diverse work groups is preferred', 'Experience with marketing concepts and building marketing strategy preferred', 'Strong communication skills', 'Demonstrated capability for problem solving, sound judgment and assertiveness is required', 'Strong analytical skills', 'Experience in design thinking is preferred', 'Up to 15% domestic travel may be required']

['Lead system admin for the Sales Cloud. Ad hoc support to the rest of the Clouds/platform.', 'Works closely with the Platform Manager to understand business processes and support needs related to the Sales, Marketing areas and other smaller business areas to deliver solutions that improve these businesses.', 'Follows data governance, processes and best practices.', 'Provision/de-provision and maintain users, roles, profiles and hierarchies.', 'Mass transfer/re-assign records including Accounts, Contacts, Cases, Opportunities, other working with stakeholders and following processes.', 'Ensures users have access to the right data by managing the platform security settings, access to apps, objects, records and fields (roles, profiles sharing rules, permission sets, etc).', 'Maintains records by performing systematic clean ups of reports, archiving of data and files in accordance to Freddie Mac’s policies and best practices.', 'Performs routinely data integrity health checks such as records de-dup and enrichment and works with stakeholders to facilitate mass data uploads of records, as needed.', 'Maintains objects and fields as needed (i.e. retire unnecessary fields), workflow updates, data validation, alerts, communication templates, etc.', 'Creates and maintains reports and dashboards that can deliver insights and success metrics.', 'Supports end users troubleshooting and resolving incidents.', 'Escalate to Customer Success Team requests related to training or re-training of users and provide recommendations for areas of opportunities to improve end user training.', 'Ad hoc support in training and adoption and mentor users/groups needing assistance.', 'Monitor usage and improve data quality.', 'Responsible for system configuration changes to ensure optimal platform performance, usability and meet strategic goals and needs for the business.', 'Engage with the business areas as needed to work collaboratively on requirement gathering, and implementing solutions for approved enhancements/changes to ensure proper design and a satisfied customer.', 'Implement lite enhancement changes adhering to all development, documentation, and testing protocols.', 'Document changes in case management and follow change processes. Document company processes and workflows.', 'Partner with IT Agile Business Analysts in requirement gathering, development of user stories and acceptance criteria, testing or facilitate such, with the appropriate business area as needed.', 'Conduct peer-testing for light changes, as needed to ensure quality and adherence to specs.', 'Proactively recommend solutions, processes, capabilities or apps that will enhance end user experience, enrich the 360 view of the customer, improve usability, enable productivity for users, optimize or automate processes and increase ROI.', '3+ years of direct experience in all aspects of developing and implementing CRM or Salesforce platform applications.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.', 'Salesforce Advanced Certification is required', 'Excellent analytical, technology, communication and problem solving skills.', 'Strong relationship management skills.', 'Experience in implementation projects using Agile methods and practices, preferred.', 'Experience developing solutions using Apex and VisualForce, preferred', 'Experience with Einstein Data Discovery, preferred', 'Experience with Eloqua, preferred', 'Additional Salesforce Certifications Preferred: Architect, Sales Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Service Cloud Consultant or Analyst Consult']

['Driving, Coordinating & Reporting Business Performance – promoting a strategic focus by linking business and financial plans to strategic goals and tracking execution of strategy.', 'Financial Planning – enable a better understanding of where the business is heading with the use of dynamic models.', 'Financial Analysis – providing insightful and actionable analysis for consumption by the C-Level, Senior Management, and Board.', "Treasury Management – maintain the Company’s senior lending relationships through daily communication of cash requirements, preparing monthly reports about the company's financial condition and projections, and regularly monitoring business decisions against senior lending covenants.", 'Own quality/accuracy of technical execution and uses mistakes as opportunities for learning and development', 'Organize and analyze portfolio performance and other data to identify and monitor trends.', 'Create reports, identify problems, and recommend solutions pertaining to budgeting and financial execution.', 'Monitor corporate development through analysis of financial information - generate and maintain financial models to evaluate Profitability, ROI, and Capital Cost, for examples.', 'Provide data collection support within numerous databases for regression and multi-variant analysis on key metrics and data elements.', 'Assist with the completion and delivery of weekly, monthly and quarterly scheduled processes and corporate presentations.', 'Respond to ad-hoc data requests for information from executive management, internal and external customers in an organizational aesthetic format and automatic schedule.', 'Update both standard and ad-hoc reports, scorecards & dashboards and analysis; maintenance of data integrity in conjunction with departmental colleagues.', 'Perform special projects as needed', '1-3 years of finance experience in modeling, management reporting, financial statements analysis, and executive presentation prep.', 'You have a Bachelor’s degree – ideally in Business, Finance, Statistics, or Economics.', 'Ensures accurate and timely completion of assigned tasks with general supervision.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a client focused, professional demeanor.', 'Thrive in dynamic environments that require adapting to change.', 'Proven ability to meet tight deadlines and prioritize workload', 'A work ethic based on a strong desire to exceed expectations.', 'Always takes initiative.', 'Proven ability and willingness to learn and make a meaningful contribution', 'Working knowledge of Financial Statements.']

['Identifies client needs and creates new service capabilities to support client success in an ACO and quality improvement programs.', 'Driving organizational learning about which population health interventions achieve cost savings and improved health outcomes in Caravan Health’s client network of hospitals and primary care practices.', 'Design and conduct pilot studies and observational analyses. Work across teams at Caravan Health and with external partners to design field experiments, including randomization and quasi-experimental approaches. Monitor study implementation and data collection. Execute rapid cycle data analyses.', 'Design and execute descriptive and predictive analyses to identify opportunities to improve care delivery, contribute to product and services development, and inform Caravan Health’s growth strategy.', 'Employ predictive analysis techniques to target population health interventions and identify strategies that are likely to succeed.', 'Working with teams across Caravan Health to identify implications of analysis results and translate findings into action. Develop dashboards, reports, and data visualizations that communicate insights from the data and inspire action.', 'Presenting analysis results to internal and external audiences, including company executives, subject matter experts, delivery teams, and clinical teams within Caravan Health.', 'Contributing to broader dissemination of learnings via external publications, conferences, and other venues as applicable.', 'Serving as subject matter expert on study design and quantitative analysis methods. Provide consultation services to other analysts and members of other teams across Caravan Health.', 'Mentor staff in areas of expertise.', 'Other duties as assigned by the VP of Clinical Analytics', 'Bachelor’s degree from an accredited university or college is required', 'Advanced degree such as M.B.A., M.P.H., M.H.A., PhD or Dr. PH preferred', '8+ Years of experience', 'Excellent quantitative analysis abilities, grounded in epidemiology, biostatistics, econometrics, health informatics, health care analytics or related field.', 'Demonstrated ability to conduct nuanced analyses to produce accurate and unbiased results and tell the story of those results in data visualizations and reports.', 'Expertise in descriptive and predictive analysis methods. Experience with regression and classification techniques.', 'Experience with causal analysis including designing and conducting experimental and quasi-experimental studies (e.g., randomized trials; regression discontinuity, difference-in-differences, instrumental variables, and matched designs).', 'Deep experience with health care data sources such as claims, electronic health record, event notification, clinical, and patient reported data. Experience with commercial payors’ data and program highly preferred.', 'Advanced data manipulation and data mining skills, including experienced in SQL programming, and R or Python.', 'Knowledge of standard methods for measuring health care utilization, spending, quality, and outcomes; risk adjustment; provider profiling; and related analytical tasks.', 'Intense attention to detail and data quality assurance.', 'Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and manage competing deadlines and priorities.', '8 year(s): • Bachelor’s degree from an accredited university or college is required • Advanced degree such as M.B.A., M.P.H., M.H.A., PhD or Dr.PH preferred• 8+ Years of experience• Excellent quantitative analysis abilities, grounded in epidemiology, biostatistics, econometrics, health informatics, health care analytics or related field.', 'Bachelors or better', 'PHD or better', 'Masters or better']

job_text: ['Be Mission-Driven. We want team members that are passionate about helping entrepreneurs improve their business and bring that passion every day.', 'Be Humble. The System Administration services team shall review these products, applications, etc., for operational readiness to ensure that they can accept operational responsibility, considering both technical and business perspective.', 'Provide Tier II and Tier III support for application releases and deployments as well as COTS products that are used in many of the USCIS mission critical applications.', 'Responsible for rebooting/restarting hardware/software in all environments particularly in the production environments under emergency conditions.', 'Work with development teams to automate releases and deployments that are currently manual (multiple USCIS systems have automated deployments).', 'Enforce standardized system and infrastructure designs and architectures.', 'Optimize system and infrastructure designs and architectures.', 'Support the identification and coordination of emerging IT solutions and technology integration opportunities.', 'Support the innovative industry best practices and technologies that maximize efficiencies and cost savings.', 'Support the development of new systems while migrating infrastructure capabilities to meet mission requirements and improve Operational efficiency of customers.', 'Support the delivery of system and infrastructure capabilities that scale to meet enterprise demand with the least re-engineering effort possible.', 'Facilitate and monitor the integration, interoperability, and synchronization of enterprise-wide systems and infrastructure solutions and services.', 'Install Operating Systems, hardware and software.', 'Troubleshoot hardware and software hosting all mission critical applications, including in regional locations and Data Centers.', 'Engage with product vendors to obtain Tier IV support when appropriate. Provide escalation to Tier IV support.', 'Collect metrics and performance statistics to optimize and troubleshoot application performance. The requirement is end-to-end performance monitoring for all applications, with the ability to provide dashboards for different audiences including developers, business users and system administrators. In addition, reports are required on an ad-hoc basis for trending analysis of utilization of all components of the infrastructure.', 'Provision virtual resources in all environments, providing technical assistance to infrastructure stakeholders to resolve failures or address system issues, and support incident management and problem management activities.', 'Perform production control activities such as the support of cyclical changes to operational workloads, data administration, data compression, data restores, reorganization of files, recovery of systems, production of reports, download/upload of information, setup and verification of files and programs.', 'Create and manage routine Maintenance Window schedule which will adhere to the USCIS Configuration Change and Release Management (CCRM) process.', 'Perform log reviews, and server configuration changes.', 'Coordinate OS upgrades, patches, fixes and testing with stakeholders.', 'Analyze data and provide recommendations to address application high availability issues and requirements.', 'Work with backup teams for backup and restoration tasks as required.', 'Maintain and validate inventory for hardware/software support agreements to ensure warranty or maintenance is current. Advise Government manager 120 days prior to expiration of all warranty or maintenance agreements.', 'Manage the device hardware, BIOS/Firmware, drivers.', 'Proactively monitor systems for Disk/CPU/Memory/Network utilization and health of systems.', 'Implement High Availability for USCIS systems (reliability, proactive maintenance, OS and database management system (DBMS) clustering, disaster recovery implementation).', 'Install application software per the installation instructions and Configuration Change and Release Management (CCRM) processes.', 'Provide the support necessary to maintain, improve, and manage the USCIS infrastructure services in all environments, and support the activities associated with hosting web-based applications and websites.', 'Use the designated ticketing system (ServiceNow) to manage incidents, changes, and service requests regarding the hosting environments.', 'Track and analyze issues and events that may show a repetitive trend in order to determine and provide root causes such as restarting or bouncing hardware or software; as such issues are analyzed, engage other Tier II and Tier III O&M support contractor resources as needed to determine fix action.', 'Work with other Tier II and III Service Desk contractors when necessary to resolve issues.', 'Provide support for the virtual environment whether it’s Hyper-V or VMware, including in regional locations.', 'Provide support to approximately 9 Flexpod located in the data centers and field sites.', 'Work closely with the server deployment team and the Platforms Engineering team to resolve significant issues as they arise.', 'Attend CIRT calls to assist in the resolution of outages related the FlexPod hardware/software and virtual environment.', 'Provide support to Citrix environment whether running on Hyper-V or VMware, escalate to Tier IV (Citrix) when needed. Make user request updates to Citrix when requested.', 'Respond to automated alerts in a timely fashion.', 'Provide patching and updating support on a scheduled basis as well and impromptu during security incidents.', 'Associate’s Degree and five years of related work experience.', 'UNIX experience.', 'Ansible experience a plus.', 'DHS USCIS Public Trust EOD', 'Office work, typically sedentary with some movement around the office.']

['Operate and maintain a vulnerability management infrastructure capable of performing and supporting credentialed scans for all approved NIH systems, including devices and applications:', 'Develop and optimize toolset and services to provide comprehensive visibility, situational awareness, and response readiness;', 'Ensure the vulnerability management capability is fully interoperable and integrated with existing vulnerability management capabilities;', 'Perform and support security scans of designated systems to assess the effectiveness of the total system security and make mitigation recommendations to the Government based on these reviews:', 'Specialized assessments for High Value Asset (HVA) and other designated systems;', 'Perform vulnerability scanning on a defined periodic basis utilizing enterprise network and endpoint scanners, analyze results of vulnerability scans, and make mitigation recommendations to the Government based on these scans:', 'Ensure compliance with federal and departmental directives and policies;', 'Provide remediation assistance as appropriate, including developing reporting and guidance;', 'Provide subject matter expertise and guidance to the business owners and system stakeholders:', 'Provide risk analysis for identified vulnerabilities and system change requests;', 'Reduce vulnerabilities within systems supporting the organizational mission;', 'Maintain regular communication with Vulnerability Management Lead, Program Manager and organizational management for collaboration, process optimization, tools tuning, information sharing, and compromise response:', 'Monitor applicable government and private sector vulnerability databases and sources to identify vulnerabilities not released through federal sources that have the potential of impacting enterprise systems;', 'Ensure assessment reports are created within specified timeframes and distributed in accordance with policy; and', 'Ensure reports are compliant with technical and functional requirements.', 'Operate and improve vulnerability management capabilities to ensure an optimal security posture;', 'Support the implementation, operation, and maintenance of the information security-related capability-based projects as defined in the Information Security Project Dashboard;', 'Provide visibility and improved response readiness across all vulnerability management capabilities;', 'Alert and escalate findings to technical POCs, as required, to potential risks presented by vulnerabilities, missing assets, configuration errors, and use of unauthorized software/hardware;', 'Provide guidance and recommendations to Vulnerability Management Lead, Program Manager and to organizational stakeholders so they can develop and prioritize mitigation steps and strategies for identified vulnerabilities, including organization-level mitigation improvement strategies and end user mitigation activities when requested; and', 'Maintain communication with the Vulnerability Management Lead, Program Manager and other designated responsible official organizations for collaboration, process optimization, tools tuning, information sharing, and compromise response.', 'Detect, discover, and protect sensitive information regardless of where or how the sensitive information is stored or used;', 'Regard sensitive information:', 'Monitor and prevent exfiltration through network gateways and endpoints;', 'Achieve visibility into encrypted data traversing the network;', 'Provide support and expertise for the automated policy enforcement capability to safeguard data privacy;', 'Support and validate the discovery of sensitive information residing within data repositories (e.g., SharePoint, network drives, databases) across the organization using the data-at-rest capability of the Data Loss/Leakage Prevention (DLP) tool:', 'Sensitive information includes but is not limited to personally identifiable information (PII), protected health information (PHI), payment card industry data security standard (PCI DSS), intellectual property, and security-related information;', 'Provide technical expertise in protecting the sensitive information from inadvertent disclosure and exfiltration while at rest, while on an endpoint, and while in motion;', 'Serve as Subject Matter Expert (SME) for the operation of a comprehensive DLP solution for the enterprise; and', 'Deploy and monitor DLP software agents on targeted workstations labeled as routinely handling sensitive data as requested', 'Enterprise information security governance, communications, program and project management, and security metrics and reporting;', 'Threat identification and incident handling, including security event detection and situational awareness;', 'Security awareness, education, and training;', 'Asset and inventory management, including both internal, external, and cloud systems;', 'Vulnerability assessment and mitigation, including vulnerability scanning, security configuration development and scanning, and internal and external penetration testing;', 'Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation (CDM);', 'Risk management, audit coordination, and corrective plan management;', 'Systems security assessment and authorization and plan of action and milestones (POA&M) management;', 'Security policy, standards and guidance formulation and oversight.', 'Experience with Enterprise Networks and systems;', 'Experience with Enterprise security log collection and management;', 'Experience with Vulnerability Scanning processes and tools (e.g. Nessus);', 'Experience with Vulnerability Management lifecycle including Discover, Prioritize, Assess, Report, Remediate, and Verify;', 'Intimate knowledge of DLP Principles and best practices including governance, risk assessment, compliance, classification methods, policies, discovery, remediation and awareness;', 'Intimate knowledge of enterprise level Data Security Lifecycle; and', 'Strong metrics collection, analytical, reporting, and communication skills.', 'Experience in enterprise level Vulnerability Management and Scanning;', 'Experience in large scale Data Loss Prevention and Data Encryption/Tokenization; and', 'Able to think “outside the box” and provide innovative and positive recommendation of improvements to incident mitigation and proactive prevention.', 'Nessus Professional Certification (Tenable.io®, Nessus®) – Tenable – Preferred;', 'Symantec™ Master Credential - Data Loss Prevention (DLP) – Symantec™ – Preferred;', 'CompTIA Network+ - CompTIA;', 'CompTIA Security+ - CompTIA.']

prepares reports on program and/or project activities, evaluates and interprets dashboard data.', 'Oversees planning, preparation and coordination of special meetings, workshops and conferences.', 'Performs site visits to provide staff assistance.', 'Serves as point of contact and/or liaison for programs or special projects with other departmental staff.', 'Performs other job responsibilities as assigned.', 'Statistical analysis methodologies and reporting procedures', 'Investigative practices and procedures', 'Initiates and supports quality management activities and performance management measures to provide the highest quality products and services that meet the needs and requirements of internal and external customers', 'Exercises logic and reasoning to define problems, establish facts and draw valid conclusions; ['Lead the strategic review, design, implementation, and communication of FLIR Systems compensation philosophy. This will involve partnering with the CEO, CHRO, other senior leadership, and consultants to ensure that the Company has a competitive and best-in-class approach to compensation offerings. Ensure that FLIR Systems is positioned to attract, motivate and retain employees around the world.', 'Plan and design wage and salary structures that balance market competitiveness, internal equity, and pay for performance; plan and design merit and bonus programs that adequately reflect differentiation based on performance, adherence to budget, and affordability. This should include embedding a rigorous data analytics/measurement approach that is metrics-based; Implement repeatable processes, systems, and best practices that are required to ensure improved operations and increased internal customer satisfaction.', 'Manage the effective communication of compensation and benefits to achieve employee awareness, understanding, and appreciation of the programs offered.', 'Serve as Subject Matter Expert in the development of annual incentive compensation and other incentive plans (including sales compensation), and oversight of benefit plans/plan design.', 'Lead and develop the Global Total Rewards Team, encouraging ongoing development to keep current on training, certification, practices, trends, and compliance matters to provide a high level of expertise to the business. Drive a “quality first” culture with the team.', 'Plan, develop, and oversee administration of health and welfare benefit programs, such as medical plans, dental, supplement life & accident. leave programs, accidental death policies, retirement and savings, and ESPP, where applicable.', 'Ensure that benefit plans are benchmarked appropriately and administered in compliance with federal and state laws and regulations (ERISA, HIPAA, FMLA, COBRA, ADA and Healthcare Reform).', 'Deliver accurate and timely reporting for all plans.', 'Work closely with other key stakeholders to ensure the Company’s benefits plans, programs and initiatives are competitive, affordable, deliverable, and consistent with the Company’s employee value proposition.', 'Interact with members of the Executive Leadership Team and peers within the HR Organization (e.g. Talent Acquisition, HR Operations, and Talent Management to identify the need for new systemic programs or revision of existing and manage their successful implementation).', 'Manage the benefits spend/budget effectively while also managing all benefit, payroll, and consulting relationships.', 'Develop and deliver materials to the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors on all relevant topics (liaising with Compensation Committee Consultants and Finance as required).', "Oversee the management of the global stock plan administration function including employee communications and education. Ensure that all equity transactions are accurately processed and settled in a timely manner and smooth interworking's between stock plan administration, finance, legal and HR.", 'Lead sales compensation program design and governance across the globe.', 'Partner with M&A leads managing global mergers and acquisition, due diligence, and integration activities related to compensation and benefits.', 'Drive a strategy and plan to ensure pay equity across all demographics at FLIR Systems.', 'Build out dashboards to provide visibility on pay parity and progression metrics to support our efforts for a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workforce.', 'Influencing capability', 'Negotiation skills', 'Employee development', 'Leadership', 'Team alignment and development', 'Compensation program design', 'Compliance', 'Strategic alignment', "Bachelor's Degree (advanced degree preferred)", '15+ years’ experience in HR; preferably in companies that have seen growth through acquisitions, with global experience and a minimum of 5 years in a leadership role', 'Experience developing innovative global compensation, wellness and benefit plans, sales compensation plans, and executive compensation programs', 'An absolute requirement: experience working with the Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors of a publicly traded company to gain agreement', 'Fully knowledgeable in the areas of compliance, transparency and the latest Sarbanes-Oxley legislation', 'Strong analytical and project management skills, proven ability to design and communicate clear processes, and a detail-oriented yet flexible approach to problem solving', 'Impeccable discretion when handling sensitive and confidential information', 'Strong bias for action and not afraid to “roll up your sleeves.” Strong results orientation and a sense of urgency with a drive to achieve results and goals in the short and long term.', 'Success driving innovation through people and progressive solutions', 'Experience in building suitable governance structures for compensation and benefits programs', 'Extensive knowledge of compensation techniques, theories, programs, and plans including executive compensation, cash compensation, merit programs, incentive/variable compensation, and equity programs, etc.', 'Data-driven with a strong ability to analyze data, turn data into insights, and action plans aligned with company goals', 'Experience working across cultures and geographies', 'Budget management experience', 'Inclusive leadership style with an emphasis on results and developing high performing team members; strong collaboration skills', 'Able to motivate and influence both direct and indirect organizations through effectively articulating the opportunities and challenges throughout the organization', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Able to package and present complex analysis and recommendations clearly and comfortably. Ability to communicate compensation and benefits strategies, plans and policies accurately and simply. This will include leading internal communications to develop communication plans for launch of new and/or revised initiatives.', 'Solid business acumen and the ability to influence and develop strong working relationships with multiple stakeholders, including executives, line management, his/her peers in human resources, and the broader employee population. Understanding of business strategies, competitive challenges, and the financial impact of HR decisions.', 'Proficiency in MS Office skills including Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and Outlook', 'Strong knowledge of global HR processes and policies', 'Experience working with a global HRIS system – Workday preferred', 'Position may require up to 30% travel', 'Excellent strategic thinking, problem-solving capabilities and judgment; ability to make sound decisions independently; solutions-oriented, and a customer-focused mind-set are essential', 'High degree of emotional intelligence, organization, confidence and motivation']

job_title: CitiStat Analyst - Office of Performance and Innovation
job_text: ['Use the power of data to improve city government service for our residents', 'Ask lots of questions and use data to answer them', 'Bring modern analytics and data tools to bear on performance management and policy', 'Have a seat at the table with leaders in city government who will use your work to inform their decision-making', 'Help grow a data-driven culture in Baltimore city government', 'Be part of a best-practice management program that inspired similar programs across the country', 'Monitor and report on high-level key performance indicators and metrics, but also perform richer "deep dive" analysis on specific issues', 'Create well-crafted data products - data visualizations, memos, dashboards, presentations - that communicate your findings to non-technical audiences', 'Present findings to executive-level staff from various city agencies and departments in City Hall (possibly the Mayor!)', 'Facilitate collaboration between city agencies to solve problems for residents', 'Intellectual curiosity', 'Self-motivation', 'Creativity', 'Persistence', 'A love of data', 'High quality work product', "You're committed to the City of Baltimore and care about serving fellow residents", "You're excited about furthering the cause of data-driven performance in Baltimore city government", 'You have picked up data analysis, modeling, and/or some programming knowledge in your education or early career - preferably with a STEM (science, technology, engineering, and math), statistics, economics or policy degree', 'You can demonstrate your ability to derive insights from data and communicate those insights to a non-technical audience', "You know a general programming language (like Python) or a statistical package (R), or at least you're a Microsoft Excel guruSalary is commensurate with experience."]

job_text: ['Master’s Degree or equivalent professional experience preferred.', 'LEAN or 6 Sigma Green Certification preferred', 'Preferred 3 years conducting analysis, requirements definition, and reporting support.', 'Preferred 3 years experience producing reporting and data visualizations in addition to supporting analytical and ad-hoc analysis with a Business Intelligence platform.', 'Analytical skills to assess information, define problems, formulate logical conclusions, develop alternative solutions and implement recommendations that optimize patient satisfaction, faculty and employee engagement, revenue, and long-term strategic growth.', 'Demonstrated experience leading process improvement activities', 'Process mapping and visualization skills.', 'Ability to create, manage and enhance interdepartmental relationships', 'Ability to work in a complex and matrixed team environment; experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.', 'Skills in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Visio.']

['SAP’s Project Portfolio Management (PPM) solution will help WORKS ensure strategic alignment in planning, prioritizing and monitoring potential Clent projects.', 'PPM will allow WORKS to manage a projects full lifecycle from the planning state to tracking and accounting to completion and reporting.', 'PPM will also provide an overview of the entire Client project portfolio.', 'Client WORKS planners will have the ability to monitor budget and resource levels, identify risks and make mid project adjustments. PPM provides robust reporting to maximize project visibility including project to date cost analysis, forecasting, what-if scenarios and the impacts of changes to the schedules, resources or costs of a project.', 'The solution will provide an easy dashboard for the project planners to review and report project progress and performance and to adjust resources between projects in the portfolio.', 'Client WORKS divisions that are involved in the project management lifecycle and will have input into the PPM process include Administration, Design, Traffic and Construction. A relevant maintenance project may also involve the Road division.', 'When a new project is initiated, funding is secured. Once funded is secured, a project is created in SAP and the budget is defined. The Design Manager informs which Project Manager (PM) is to be assigned the project.', 'The PM is contacted to provide project information and a project description.', 'The project is currently set up in a homegrown access database (internally known as “GUS”).', 'Thereafter, the design phase begins. Once the project design is 90% completed, the construction funding is secured.', 'A Project Care Package is sent to Client Purchasing Department so that Purchasing can send it out for competitive bids.', 'Once the bid process is complete, the project is awarded, and construction begins. After the project is complete, the asset is created in SAP and the project is settled and closed in SAP.', 'Currently, three different databases are used to track all interlocal agreements, professional service contracts and, the money owed to the Client for the projects.', 'Business Requirements Document (BRD) – Identify the business requirements.', 'Statement of Work (SOW) – Define the work required to implement the PPM solution', 'GAP Analysis – Identify any gaps in functionality and organizational readiness.', 'Support Plan – Identify the system resources, personnel and overall plan for supporting the solution identified in the blueprinting sessions.', 'Cost Estimate – A high level budgetary cost estimate for implementation of the project.', 'We are seeking help to define and document the specific business requirements and critical activities that must be performed to setup and configure SAP’s PPM module to meet PUBLIC WORKS’ organizational objectives via various workshops. The deliverables for these workshops are as follows:', 'These documents will detail the business solution for the project including the documentation of customer requirements, expectations, preparatory tasks for organizational readiness, gaps and the steps that should be taken to ensure gaps are met successfully.', 'PROVIDER will augment the OWNER’s functional teams with consultant support that uses OWNER established protocols and procedures, agreed upon time frames for completion, and agreed upon design.', 'All work will be performed remotely via conference calls and screen sharing sessions with the Clark County Public Works Department and ERP Office during normal work hours.', 'Three years of experience gathering requirements, implementing and/or supporting SAP Project Portfolio Management module;', 'The candidate(s) must have completed more than one implementation of Project Systems, FICO, HCM or CATS integration with PPM', 'Ideally candidate(s) should have completed an implementation from an outside database into SAP PPM.', 'Have good SAP project management skills and experience following SAP Best Practices;', 'Public sector experience; Prior project management experience in Public sector', 'Identifying hands-on activities as related to Project and Project Portfolio integration and/or touch points (i.e. BW, HCM, CATS etc);', 'Bringing best practice approaches for the customer to consider in a variety of areas including transport, testing, design, prototyping, training, defining support requirements and procedures, etc.;', 'Ability to develop a Business Requirements document, Gap Analysis document, Organizational Readiness document including the ability to conduct related research and work with the Client Team to discuss possible options;', 'Experience with writing related customer documentation to be used for future reference;', 'Good communication skills (written and verbal);', 'Team player', 'Speak and write in English well', 'Ability to plan and organize work and responsibilities; and', 'Good facilitation skills.', 'Coordinate and facilitate Workshops for the purpose of defining and documenting the specific business requirements and critical activities that must be performed to meet PUBLIC WORKS’ organizational objectives for the future implementation of Project Portfolio Management.', 'Design, develop, and deliver a Business Requirements Document (BRD), a Statement of Work (SOW) for future implementation, a Cost Estimate and a Gap Analysis for Project Portfolio Management.', 'Define County staffing requirements for implementation and ongoing support of Project Portfolio Management.', 'Provide clear and concise deliverable documentation.', 'Other related activities as required.', '8 hour shift', 'Monday to Friday', 'Project Portfolio integration and/or touch points: 3 years (Required)', 'Outside database into SAP PPM.: 3 years (Required)', 'Public sector: 3 years (Required)', 'Project Systems, FICO, HCM or CATS integration with PPM: 3 years (Required)', 'Gap Analysis document: 3 years (Required)', 'SAP Project Portfolio Management module: 3 years (Required)', 'SAP project management: 3 years (Required)', 'Business Requirements document: 3 years (Required)', 'Customer documentation: 3 years (Required)']

job_title: Supply Chain and Logistics Optimization Analyst
job_text: ['Independently lead cross-functional projects to develop statistical and mathematical models to tackle supply chain problems across the business.', 'Perform data analytics, forecasting, and optimization of related processes to support business decision making.', 'Apply knowledge of supply chain and logistics including procurement, inventory, planning, and movement of materials and products according to the needs and objectives of the company.', 'Seek opportunities to evaluate and improve existing supply chain plans to reduce the costs of transportation, distribution, and warehousing.', 'Analyze model outputs and generate reports to provide recommendations to key partners. Effectively communicate and present results to the stakeholders and senior management.', "A Graduate degree in Supply Chain, Industrial Engineering, Operations Research, or a related engineering and science discipline with a minimum of 2 years of experience in applying operations research and/or statistical modeling techniques.-Or-A Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain, Industrial Engineering, Operations Research, or a related engineering and science discipline with at least 5 years of related experience.", 'Programming skills in at least one programming language (C++/Python/Java), math programming engine (CPLEX/Gurobi), Statistical package (R/SAS), SQL.', 'Knowledge of mathematical modeling skills such as Linear Programming, Mixed Integer Programming, Heuristics, etc.', 'Familiarity and experience with other analytical approaches (machine learning, statistics, etc.).', 'Very strong analytical abilities and problem-solving skills', 'Experience with SQL and relational databases.', 'Familiar with cloud computing such as MS Azure.', 'Experience developing dashboards using visualization technologies such as Tableau and Power BI.', 'Ability to communicate effectively through oral presentations and written reports.', 'Knowledge of software development methodology is a plus.']

["Mid-level Data Scientist/analyst with Tableau, Alteryx and Python specifically; Strong analytical mind; Experience in data visualization techniques, who can independently figure out how to combine various data sources or data points to answer a business question, and do the story-telling part (visualizing so the answer can be 'seen') - without too much direction or guidance", 'Direct, hands-on experience with Tableau; Building visualizations/reports and assembling dashboards in Tableau', 'Direct, hands-on experience with Alteryx; Integrating data sources into Alteryx or Apache AirFlow', 'Python coding experience for some custom API based integrations', 'Good communication skills']

['Data Analyst (Big Data Platform) Bristol, Connecticut 18 month contract $70-$', 'Comprehensive Medical Benefits', 'Competitive Pay, 401K', 'Retirement Plan', 'The Big Data Analyst will work within the Data Platform and will be charged with delivering actionable data insights from client’s large and diverse set of first and third party data sources. This data will come from every aspect of the user journey and product experience - user on-boarding, registration, personalization, ad-sales. Data models will be both implicit and explicit. The primary objective will be to apply modern big data techniques to discover patterns in user behavior that can be leveraged to drive three main metrics – user frequency, user engagement and revenue yield. Further, you will be tasked with building models to segment and cluster consumers based on vast amount of digital and broadcast content – marrying these models with user behavior patterning to deliver personalized, unique experiences to each client consumers.Stake holder interviews to build self-serve analytical framework – requirements may include consumer engagement as well as digital ad engagements across all products.• Selecting methods for performing advanced data analysis.• Extensive big data analysis and come up with logic to build analytical dimensions and metrics using Hive, Spark QL or Scripting Languages such as Python.• Document logic in order to help engineering team to implement them.• Build statistical models using tools specified above.• Clearly communicate design & development strategies to all stake holders, educate them as and when needed.• Establishes, supports and maintains standards of the analytics and data analytics process.• Work with engineering team to build infrastructure designed to facilitate the construction of models and the exposure of those models to end users throughout the company.• Work with engineering team to automate daily monitoring of models in production, help troubleshoot issues and make necessary improvements as needed.• Performing ad hoc analysis, interpreting and communicating results in a clear manner• Processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis• Evangelize the work product of the data science function within the company - both upward to executive management and across to peers and constituent groups.• Coordinate and execute experiments and create frameworks to support those experiments designed to inform both the strategic and tactical initiatives of the Product team.• Assist in the preparation of presentations and formal analysis in support of executive decision making and strategy development.• Understands complex source systems in order to recreate different scenarios for testing and analysis.• Participates in ensuring that assigned projects adhere to agreed-upon functional specification and applicable testing standards.• Uses ingenuity in applying analytical techniques and organizational skills to identifying and evaluating alternatives and to developing recommended approaches to resolving issues with ongoing process improvement.• First-hand experience – Have 6+ years of professional experience as a Data Analyst mining large scale data and transform data points to knowledge.• Data ninja – Must be hands-on on data analysis tools and frameworks such as SQL, Hive, Spark QL or Python to analyze any amount of data to solve business requirements, feed in to engineering team to build data transformations, and ensure data is transformed and loaded accordingly.• Visionary - Solid understanding of big data and other related databases and how an organization will be able build data driven products.• Have a data toolbox – Familiar with technologies relevant to the data such as Hadoop, OLAP databases and visualization tools such as Tableau, Business Objects, Microstrategy, or similar. Experience with, and a thorough understanding of different database management platforms (e.g. Oracle, Snowflake, PostgreSQL, Druid).Masters in Computer Science or similar is preferred.• Experience with machine learning models.• Data and analytics/measurement experience in digital or mobile app environment preferred.• Experience in Digital Ads experience such as Video and Display Ad measurements will be huge plus.', 'Must have experience:', 'Comprehensive Medical Benefits', 'Competitive Pay, 401K', 'Retirement Plan', 'And Much More']
